Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging    
growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act (17

Item 9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits Exhibits are filed 
herewith in connection with the Registration Statement on Form  
S-3(File No. 333-269514)filed by Wells Fargo & Company (the     
“Company”) with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the     
“SEC”). On January 24, 2025, the Company issued the following   
Medium-Term Notes, Series W: (i) $3,000,000,000 Senior          
Redeemable Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due January 24, 2031;    
(ii) $2,350,000,000 Senior Redeemable Fixed-to-FloatingRate     
Notes due January 24, 2028; and (iii) $650,000,000 Senior       
Redeemable Floating Rate Notes due January 24, 2028             
(collectively, the “Notes”). The purpose of this Current Report 
is to file with the SEC the following documents: (i) the form of
Note related to each issuance; and (ii) the opinion of Faegre   
Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP regarding the Notes. (d) Exhibits
